title: 10 best places to see the 'blood moon' total lunar eclipse on March 3
description: From dark-sky parks to remote deserts, these locations offer prime views of the March 3, 2026, blood moon.
content: From dark-sky parks to remote deserts, these locations offer prime views of the March 3, 2026, blood moon.
